name: GetNoteDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a note by its unique ID.

Use this tool to get details of a note from HubSpot CRM using its unique ID. You can specify additional properties to control the returned data.

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the note to retrieve details for.

parameters.name: properties_to_return
parameters.description: A list of property names to return for the note. Non-existing properties will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: return_properties_with_history
parameters.description: List properties to return with their history of previous values. Ignored if not present on the object.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associated_object_types
parameters.description: List the object types to retrieve associated IDs for, separated by commas. Invalid types are ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Specify the unique property name to identify the object in HubSpot CRM.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: return_archived_results_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived notes.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: propertiesWithHistory
parameters.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
